summary: An email from a forensic accountant at the FBI New York Field Office regarding a draft analysis of a 2019 tax return, requesting a time to schedule a call to walk through the analysis. The email includes an attachment of the analysis document.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The sender of the email who prepared a draft analysis of a 2019 tax return and is requesting to schedule a call to discuss it.

events.title: Email regarding 2019 Tax Return Analysis
events.description: A forensic accountant at the FBI New York Field Office sends an email with a draft analysis of a 2019 tax return attached, requesting to schedule a call to walk through the analysis.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

locations: FBI New York Field Office NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: The FBI New York Field Office was conducting forensic accounting analysis on a 2019 tax return as of December 2020.
A draft analysis document titled '2019_Tax_Return_Analysis_V1_12-11-20.pdf' was attached to the email.
The forensic accountant requested to schedule a call to walk through the analysis, indicating ongoing investigative work.
